TermsOfService.introductionText: Welcome to our blog. By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
TermsOfService.acceptanceOfTermsText: By using our website, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website.
TermsOfService.userObligationsItem1: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
TermsOfService.userObligationsItem2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
TermsOfService.userObligationsItem3: You agree not to use our website for any unlawful or prohibited activities.
TermsOfService.intellectualPropertyText: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of the website owner and is protected by intellectual property laws.
TermsOfService.disclaimerOfWarrantiesText: Our website is provided on an 'as-is' basis without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
TermsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityText: We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of the use of our website.
TermsOfService.indemnificationText: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the website owner from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from your use of our website.
TermsOfService.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page.
TermsOfService.contactInformationText: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at support@yourblog.com.

PrivacyPolicy.introductionText: Welcome to our blog. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you access our website. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site.
PrivacyPolicy.personalInformationText: We may collect personal information you provide when you register on our site, sign up for our newsletter, or interact with us in other ways. This information may include: Name, email address, contact information.
PrivacyPolicy.nonPersonalInformationText: We also collect non-personal information automatically when you visit our site. This information may include: IP address, browser type and version, pages you visit, your visit times and dates.
PrivacyPolicy.howWeUseYourInformationText: We use the information collected in the following ways: To provide and maintain our site, to improve our site and services, to send you updates, newsletters, and other information related to your interests, to respond to your requests and provide customer support, to comply with legal obligations.
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesAndTrackingTechnologiesText: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our site. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our site and improve your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyServicesText: Our site may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. Please review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPolicy.yourRightsText: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information: The right to access your personal information, The right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information, The right to delete your personal information, The right to restrict processing of your personal information, The right to object to processing of your personal information, The right to data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
PrivacyPolicy.changesToPrivacyPolicyText: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the effective date of the update. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
PrivacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Email: support@yourblog.com, Address: [Your Address].

Helps.create_account_step1: You can use your email to register a MYBES account
Helps.create_account_step2: Go to the registration page of
Helps.create_account_step4: Carefully read the terms and privacy policy before confirming, then check the confirmation box
Helps.create_account_step5: Click the register button to create an account
Helps.create_account_step6: After successful registration, you will be redirected to the account activation page, and an email with an activation code will be sent to your email
Helps.create_account_step7: Enter your email and the activation code to activate your account
Helps.create_account_step8: Congratulations! You have successfully registered and can now use MYBES
Helps.create_blog_title: How to create a blog post
Helps.create_blog_step7: Here you can choose an image as the thumbnail for your post
Helps.create_blog_step8: Click upload to create a blog post
Helps.delete_blog_title: How to delete a blog post
Helps.delete_blog_step1: Click the ... button in the bottom right corner of the blog post
Helps.edit_blog_title: How to edit a blog post
Helps.edit_blog_step1: Click the ... button in the bottom right corner of the blog post
Helps.edit_blog_step3: Make changes to your blog post

Contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below.

MYBES.thankYouMessage: First of all, thank you for using MYBES's services
MYBES.sloganIntro: MYBES is an acronym from the website's slogan
MYBES.description: MYBES is a blogging website that helps you create your own blog site. MYBES provides a highly customizable editor and an AI chatbot (from OpenAI) to assist users in writing content. Additionally, MYBES provides a free blog API if you already have your own website and want to integrate a blog into it.
MYBES.aiChatbotDescription: MYBES provides an AI chatbot from OpenAI, equivalent to chatGPT 3.5, designed to assist users in writing blog content. However, chat history is not saved, so data will be lost when the user refreshes or revisits the site.
MYBES.apiDescription: Yes, MYBES provides APIs for retrieving all your blog data. These are read-only (GET) APIs and cannot modify your data. If you want to edit or update your blogs, you must do so on the MYBES website.

ChatBotDocs.title: ChatBot AI Documentation
ChatBotDocs.intro: MYBES's AI chatbot utilizes OpenAI's API, featuring:
ChatBotDocs.free_note: You can use the MYBES AI chatbot for free, but please note:

warnings.testing_feature: This is a test feature of the MYBES AI chatbot
warnings.no_history: Chat history will not be saved. If you refresh or reload the page (F5), all conversations will be lost
warnings.independent_questions: Due to cost concerns, MYBES does not store prior questions and answers to connect them with subsequent ones. Each question is independent, so AI responses may differ from previous ones
warnings.image_generation: Image generation takes time as the AI processes your request. Please limit your input to 200 words for image creation. Rest assured, images created by the AI are stored by MYBES and will not be lost after 5 minutes like OpenAI
warnings.er: If the chatbot stops working or encounters an error while in use, please contact us for the quickest resolution

ChatBotDocs.thank_you: Thank you for using this feature ❤️
